name: Click to be god
description:
I'm trying to start making games in Godot, so this is my first attempt. Hope to be able to make something 3d soon.
If you liked the style of this game, I suggest you to see some others I made:

Overworld Dungeon is a roguelike game full of itens that goes in overworld, pretty inspired in Minecraft.

Medieval Aliens is an adventure open world game where you need to defeat aliens in dice-based battles.
